tradestock.view

Interface IView

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    CommandView

    public interface IView
    An interface of View. It works with controller to "communicate" with users, provide user input and program output.

      • outBuyAmount

                  java.time.LocalDate date,
                  double money)
        Output message that remind users buy by provided certain amount of money success.
        Parameters:
        portfolioName - name of the portfolio that buy stock in.
        stockSymbol - symbol of the stock that buy into portfolio.
        date - date of buying the stock.
        money - the certain amount money used to buy stock.
